deck.name: Royal Recruits
deck.description: Deploys a line of recruits armed with spears, shields and wooden buckets. They dream of ponies and one day wearing metal buckets.

deck.name: Wizard
deck.description: The most awesome man to ever set foot in the Arena, the Wizard will blow you away with his handsomeness... and/or fireballs.

deck.name: Giant
deck.description: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. A real one-man wrecking crew!

deck.name: Electro Wizard
deck.description: He lands with a "POW!", stuns nearby enemies and shoots lightning with both hands! What a show off.

deck.name: Arrows
deck.description: Arrows pepper a large area, damaging all enemies hit. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Guards
deck.description: Three ruthless bone brothers with shields. Knock off their shields and all that's left are three ruthless bone brothers.

deck.name: Cannon Cart
deck.description: A Cannon on wheels?! Bet they won't see that coming! Once you break its shield, it becomes a Cannon not on wheels.

deck.name: Graveyard
deck.description: Surprise! It's a party. A Skeleton party, anywhere in the Arena. Yay!

deck.name: Elite Barbarians
deck.description: Spawns a pair of leveled up Barbarians. They're like regular Barbarians, only harder, better, faster and stronger.

deck.name: Battle Ram
deck.description: Two Barbarians holding a big log charge at the nearest building, dealing significant damage if they connect; then they go to town with their swords!

deck.name: Fire Spirits
deck.description: These three Fire Spirits are on a kamikaze mission to give you a warm hug. It'd be adorable if they weren't on fire.

deck.name: Rocket
deck.description: Deals high damage to a small area. Looks really awesome doing it. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Magic Archer
deck.description: Not quite a Wizard, nor an Archer - he shoots a magic arrow that passes through and damages all enemies in its path. It's not a trick, it's magic!

deck.name: Royal Giant
deck.description: Destroying enemy buildings with his massive cannon is his job; making a raggedy blond beard look good is his passion.

deck.name: Baby Dragon
deck.description: Flying troop that deals area damage. Baby dragons hatch cute, hungry and ready for a barbeque.

deck.name: The Log
deck.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

deck.name: Hunter
deck.description: He deals BIG damage up close - not so much at range. What he lacks in accuracy, he makes up for with his impressively bushy eyebrows.

deck.name: Lightning
deck.description: Bolts of lightning damage and stun up to three enemy troops or buildings with the most hitpoints in the target area. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Fire Spirits
deck.description: These three Fire Spirits are on a kamikaze mission to give you a warm hug. It'd be adorable if they weren't on fire.

deck.name: Dark Prince
deck.description: The Dark Prince deals area damage and lets his spiked club do the talking for him - because when he does talk, it sounds like he has a bucket on his head.

deck.name: Giant
deck.description: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. A real one-man wrecking crew!

deck.name: Skeleton Barrel
deck.description: It's a Skeleton party in the sky, until all the balloons pop... then it's a Skeleton party on the ground!

deck.name: Inferno Tower
deck.description: Defensive building, roasts targets for damage that increases over time. Burns through even the biggest and toughest enemies!

deck.name: Ice Wizard
deck.description: This chill caster throws ice shards that slow down enemies' movement and attack speed. Despite being freezing cold, he has a handlebar mustache that's too hot for TV.

deck.name: Valkyrie
deck.description: Tough melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swarm or horde, no problem! She can take them all out with a few spins.

deck.name: Royal Recruits
deck.description: Deploys a line of recruits armed with spears, shields and wooden buckets. They dream of ponies and one day wearing metal buckets.

deck.name: Minion Horde
deck.description: Six fast, unarmored flying attackers. Three's a crowd, six is a horde!

deck.name: Golem
deck.description: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. When destroyed, explosively splits into two Golemites and deals area damage!

deck.name: Cannon Cart
deck.description: A Cannon on wheels?! Bet they won't see that coming! Once you break its shield, it becomes a Cannon not on wheels.

deck.name: Skeletons
deck.description: Three fast, very weak melee fighters. Surround your enemies with this pile of bones!

deck.name: Zap
deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Zappies
deck.description: Spawns a pack of miniature Zap machines. Who controls them...? Only the Master Builder knows.

deck.description: Three unarmored ranged attackers. Who the heck taught these guys to throw spears!? Who thought that was a good idea?!

deck.name: Rascals
deck.description: Spawns a mischievous trio of Rascals! The boy takes the lead, while the girls pelt enemies from behind... with slingshots full of Double Trouble Gum!

deck.name: Archers
deck.description: A pair of lightly armored ranged attackers. They'll help you take down ground and air units, but you're on your own with hair coloring advice.

deck.name: Heal
deck.description: Heal your troops to keep them in the fight! Friendly troops are healed over time while in the target area. Doesn't affect buildings.

deck.name: Arrows
deck.description: Arrows pepper a large area, damaging all enemies hit. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Golem
deck.description: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. When destroyed, explosively splits into two Golemites and deals area damage!

deck.name: Minion Horde
deck.description: Six fast, unarmored flying attackers. Three's a crowd, six is a horde!

deck.name: Goblins
deck.description: Three fast, unarmored melee attackers. Small, fast, green and mean!

deck.name: Minions
deck.description: Three fast, unarmored flying attackers. Roses are red, minions are blue, they can fly, and will crush you!

deck.name: Royal Recruits
deck.description: Deploys a line of recruits armed with spears, shields and wooden buckets. They dream of ponies and one day wearing metal buckets.

deck.name: Mega Knight
deck.description: He lands with the force of 1,000 mustaches, then jumps from one foe to the next dealing huge area damage. Stand aside!

deck.name: Poison
deck.description: Covers the area in a deadly toxin, damaging enemy troops and buildings over time. Yet somehow leaves the grass green and healthy. Go figure!

deck.name: Mirror
deck.description: Mirrors your last card played for +1 Elixir.

deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Minions
deck.description: Three fast, unarmored flying attackers. Roses are red, minions are blue, they can fly, and will crush you!

deck.name: Spear Goblins
deck.description: Three unarmored ranged attackers. Who the heck taught these guys to throw spears!? Who thought that was a good idea?!

deck.name: Giant
deck.description: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. A real one-man wrecking crew!

deck.name: Princess
deck.description: This stunning Princess shoots flaming arrows from long range. If you're feeling warm feelings towards her, it's probably because you're on fire.

deck.name: Valkyrie
deck.description: Tough melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swarm or horde, no problem! She can take them all out with a few spins.

deck.name: Goblin Barrel
deck.description: Spawns three Goblins anywhere in the Arena. It's going to be a thrilling ride, boys!

deck.name: Ice Spirit
deck.description: Spawns one lively little Ice Spirit to freeze a group of enemies. Stay frosty.

deck.name: Fireball
deck.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Tesla
deck.description: Defensive building. Whenever it's not zapping the enemy, the power of Electrickery is best kept grounded.

deck.name: Skeletons
deck.description: Three fast, very weak melee fighters. Surround your enemies with this pile of bones!

deck.name: Valkyrie
deck.description: Tough melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swarm or horde, no problem! She can take them all out with a few spins.

deck.name: The Log
deck.description: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

deck.name: X-Bow
deck.description: Nice tower you got there. Would be a shame if this X-Bow whittled it down from this side of the Arena...

deck.name: Archers
deck.description: A pair of lightly armored ranged attackers. They'll help you take down ground and air units, but you're on your own with hair coloring advice.

deck.name: Giant Skeleton
deck.description: The bigger the skeleton, the bigger the bomb. Carries a bomb that blows up when the Giant Skeleton dies.

deck.name: Sparky
deck.description: Sparky slowly charges up, then unloads MASSIVE area damage. Overkill isn't in her vocabulary.

deck.name: Fire Spirits
deck.description: These three Fire Spirits are on a kamikaze mission to give you a warm hug. It'd be adorable if they weren't on fire.

deck.name: Wizard
deck.description: The most awesome man to ever set foot in the Arena, the Wizard will blow you away with his handsomeness... and/or fireballs.

deck.name: Zap
deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Tornado
deck.description: Drags enemy troops to its center while dealing damage over time, just like a magnet. A big, swirling, Tornado-y magnet. Doesn't affect buildings.

deck.name: Fireball
deck.description: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Mini P.E.K.K.A
deck.description: The Arena is a certified butterfly-free zone. No distractions for P.E.K.K.A, only destruction.
